Name: Instant Shirk
Desc:
Enables you to evade additionally at a certain rate. Bonus Evade Rate is combined with Dual Breed Defensive when applied. Additionally increases Rocket System Damage.
Required Skill: Rocket System 2nd Enhancement Lv. 14 or higher

Desc.Old:
Enables you to evade additionally at a certain rate. Bonus Evade Rate is combined with Dual Breed Defensive when applied. Increases the power of the missiles that are fired from Aegis System.
Required Skill: Lv. 10 Aegis System or higher
Desc.New:
Enables you to evade additionally at a certain rate. Bonus Evade Rate is combined with Dual Breed Defensive when applied. Additionally increases Rocket System Damage.
Required Skill: Rocket System 2nd Enhancement Lv. 14 or higher

H.Old: 40% chance of additional evasion. Increases the damage of the missiles that are fired from Aegis System by 20%.
H.New: A 40% chance of additional evasion and Rocket System Damage +49%
